Message.Title: Wall Street's New Hottest Play
Message.Msg: Research Concurrent (CCUR) right away! They have the world's largest video-on-demand (VOD) market share! CCUR is also now capturing a huge share of the booming multi-screen video delivery market! CCUR dipped a little bit on Wednesday to $6.75 after making a huge gain on Tuesday and has only 8.72mm shares outstanding. CCUR is sitting on $24.6mm in cash with no debt. CCUR has an enterprise value of only $34.26mm, which is just 0.52X its latest annualized revenues of $66.4mm and 3X its trailing nine month cash flow from operations on an annualized basis. Ericsson (ERIC) announced last week they are paying Microsoft (MSFT) just under $200mm to purchase their Mediaroom multi-screen video delivery software, which has a multi-screen reach of 11 million pay-TV households and will increase ERIC's multi-screen reach to 16 million households. CCUR's MediaHawk multi-screen software is superior and CCUR has already signed multi-screen deals with the #1 largest cable TV companies in Japan, Germany, and the UK. These huge CCUR multi-screen clients will give CCUR an initial multi-screen reach of 14.8 million subscribers, which will be the second largest multi-screen reach in the industry! CCUR spent $15mm to acquire their Media Data Intelligence division, which tracks the TV viewing behavior of 35mm pay-TV subscribers and holds a 35% market share in the markets it serves. CCUR also has a "real-time" ultra high performance computer technology business with annualized revenue of $27.6mm and 4 of the world's top 5 defense contractors as clients. This business could be worth over $25mm. CCUR's video business with $33.8mm in annualized revenue is not receiving any value at CCUR's current share price! CCUR is extremely profitable with its EPS doubling the past two quarters in a row! Major consolidation has been taking place in this space and a lot more is expected throughout 2013. CCUR looks ready to breakout for large short-term gains.

Message.Title: Facebook "HOME".
Message.Msg: "Facebook is inserting itself between users and Google, diverting them to the social network's own ads and services. It's taking advantage of the fact that Google places few restrictions on how phone manufacturers and software developers modify Android. By contrast, Facebook Home would not work on the iPhone without approval from Apple Inc., and close collaboration with the company. Facebook Home can only reside on Android because only Google was daft enough to allow it."

Message.Msg: if they announced good news mms will squueeze up 60 points
The ad market is shifting towards Facebook & Twitter....

not until the economy crashes. People are finally understanding how great of a company google is. It has no negatives, and so many growth opportunities, like driver-less cars, google glass, google fiber, google chrome OS (for enterprise), youtube (to attack comcast/verizon), motorola to manufacture their own hardware. Seriously. youd have to be a complete idiot to think google, long term, is not going to break 1k.

facebook is becoming less and less relevant. People prefer to have a clean install for OS. Google Plus does everything facebook does and is less intrusive. The allure of constantly reading friends junk is over. I'd rather have my phone autoupload pictures to google cloud where I can pick and choose what to share, or never worry about them. Thats the true future of a social media site. Facebook is boring in the eyes of millions. Google had it right all along.

Hey loop, I've noticed that stocks often trade the opposite direction of where the er will send them. Not etched in stone but happens often. Other thing.....whatever direction er sends the stock, esp. Goog, tends to be the trend for at least a couple weeks. Look at the charts, last two er's did this to Goog. Last quarter it was a $50 gap up, and ran another $44.00 Quarter before that, $50. straight drop down, then another $50 down side. Hopefully you can manage to recoup some loss here, but keep a positive outlook, you should have a chance to more than make up for it after er.
Everyone should learn the lesson from Apple which has its stock price slashed by half so far because people created a bubble. Google PE is 23 which is expensive compared to Apple PE of just 8.
Correction, on the gap up last quarter, Goog ran another $94 upside.

Also, google chrome OS is googles 'closed' ecosytem. At anytime, google could merge android and chrome OS and shut everyone out of their ecosystem and move into the realm of windows 8 OS fusion between tablets, phones, and enterprise systems.

Topic.Title: I have no doubt goog will go up

Message.Msg: 844 made no sense. But it wasn't that fast of a drop really. Either way. Only a few know what googles going to post today, but i for one am optimistic. The majority of people aren't really smart enough to understand the foundation google has built for the long term. Business Analyst are essentially stupid people, thats why they do business. They study the short term because long term thoughts are too difficult for their incredibly simple mathematical formulas. They look at google fiber and scratch their heads. "Expensive rollout the say" - based on figures taken from today. Its too hard to factor in increased technology and efficiency upgrades for rolling out fiber. They look at motorola acquisition for some reason can't acknowledge the incredibly nexus line of products. They don't see the eventual merging of Chrome OS and Android, and Google's eventual domination of the enterprise through cheap laptops and cloud storage. They don't understand how tablets and touch screens will eventually be on TVs, mall kiosks, refrigerators, restaurant tables, etc, and how an open source OS allows for that and puts googles name on each one. Not to mention: Google Drive, Google driver-less cars, Google Maps, Youtube, Image Search, Google Plus, Google Books, Google everything. If you can't see the infrastructure that google is lying out then you don't deserve to be an analyst. The war is already over. Each and every battle is just an irrelevant contest between losers. Google is set up to rule this world, and the only thing that can stop it is government interference. And even at that point....what are they going to do other than send the military in to take it over.

I disagree with you, people like to be more social with their friends, and Facebook's HOME does that, we will all see Google revenue number declining next quarter when most companies will start shifting their contracts with Google to Facebook.

Message.Title: Google's Glass project is a complete failure.
Message.Msg: - It's too expensive ($1500). - Prohibited by law to wear when driving in most countries. - Prohibited by Google to sell for children below 13 year of age. - Wearable devices have proven impractical for most people. - Non water proof. - Easy to steal in crowded streets. - Battery won't last long because of its small size.

Message.Title: IGXT (Mcap $31 M) 4x FDA approvals within 1 Year & Profitable this Year = 10++ Bagger Potential !!!
Message.Msg: Hi Guys .. Intelgenx launched their first drug Forfivo in October this will drive Intelgenx into Profitability this Year because of its very low burn-rate of around $1.2 Mil a year ! IGXT Submits NDA for Anti-Migraine Versafilm to FDA in March another 1x NDA filing for Erectile Dysfunction Versafilm and 2x ANDA filings expected in 1H 2013. Two Partnerships for Anti-Migraine and Erectile Dysfunction products is expected in 1H 2013 too which means more Cash for Intelgenx .Intelgenx has 9x Drugs in late stage which will be all on the Market within next 2-3 years . IGXT has NO DEBT and Cash untill 2016 means enough to drive this Company into Profitability which is expected for this Year . Current Market Cap of just $31 M is really Brutally Underpriced . IGXT has the Potential to hit $10++ within 2 Year ! GLTA Intelgenx (IGXT) Market Cap : $31 M Cash: $3.5 M Burn-Rate : $1.2 M a year Price : $0.63 Shares Out : 50 M ( 20 M shares are held by Insiders & Institutions) March 27, 2013 IntelGenx Corp. a Canadian drug delivery company focusing on oral drug delivery, today announced that, together with its co-development partner RedHill Biopharma ("RedHill"), it has submitted a 505(b)(2) New Drug Application ("NDA") to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration ("FDA") for the Company's anti-migraine oral film product, a novel oral thin-film formulation based on its proprietary VersaFilm(TM) technology containing Rizatriptan, the active drug in Merck's Maxalt-MLT(R) orally disintegrating tablets. "We are very excited that our first FDA-approved product, Forfivo XL(TM), has been launched in the USA in early October by our partner Edgemont Pharmaceuticals. We believe that ForFivo XL(TM), as the only single tablet 450mg bupropion HCl available in the U.S., will be a valuable tool for physicians in their management of patients with major depressive disorders," stated Dr. Horst G. Zerbe, President and CEO of IntelGenx. .,.,

Message.Title: apple beating google
Message.Msg: Is Apple Beating Google at Its Own Game? By Evan Niu, CFA | More Articles | Save For Later April 18, 2013 | Comments (0) GOOGGoogle CAPS Rating 4/5 Stars $765.91 $-16.65 (-2.13%) + Watch GOOG on My Watchlist What You Should Know About GOOG Premium Research from The Motley Fool More about GOOG 2 Scary Numbers for Yahoo! 4 Things That Can Go Wrong for Apple Next Week BROWSE ALL GOOG ARTICLES Don't let it get away! Keep track of the stocks that matter to you. Help yourself with the Fool's FREE and easy new watchlist service today. Click Here Now Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL ) has devices with integrated hardware and software. Google (NASDAQ: GOOG ) has search and advertising. This dichotomy has existed since the dawn of time (this may be an exaggeration). For the most part, the two competing titans have mostly acknowledged each other's respective strengths in their core businesses, even if they dip their toes in to compete a little from time to time. You'd normally think it impossible for Nexus devices to outsell iDevices, or Apple to beat Google in advertising. Well, you'd be partially wrong with the latter. According to a recent report from MoPub, iOS is beating Android in mobile ad market share, grabbing 75% of advertiser spending. That's when combining iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch ad spending to total Android ad spending.

Topic.Title: Google’s YouTube Wins Dismissal of Viacom Copyright Lawsuit- More great NEWS!!

Message.Msg: Exciting yeah ahead!

Message.Title: Did Google really beat Street estimates ?
Message.Msg: Google’s GOOG +1.53% first quarter appeared to beat Wall Street’s estimates, with the company reporting first quarter earnings of $9.94 a share. Excluding traffic acquisition costs, its adjusted profit was $11.58 a share, up from the consensus estimate of $10.65 according to FactSet. One analyst interviewed by MarketWatch said that Google’s Motorola mobile phone business was “sliding fast.” Google reported that its Motorola Mobility business reported an operating loss of $271 million. While Google narrowed Motorola’s losses from the previous fourth quarter, revenue, however, fell on a sequential basis to $1.02 billion, down from $1.51 billion in the fourth quarter. It’s likely that because of the losses at Motorola, Google was able to take advantage of a low tax rate that boosted the bottom line. In the fourth quarter, the company’s tax rate was 18.5%. This quarter, it was 8%. Google’s upbeat numbers contrasted with many other tech firms in the first week of earnings season, most notable Intel, IBM and chief Google rival Yahoo. But if the beat was fueled by lower taxes, investors may edge back to a cautious stance.

Message.Title: I am so sorry momma and popa. I played the stock market and lost the house.
Message.Msg: I know you you still love me, you have to ... because that is what parents do. You told me the road to hell is paved with good intentions. Momma that is what I had, I wanted to make sure yo had enough money for retirement... Dad I wanted you to be happy. I had no idea they told me the market was at an all time high, they showed me gold at 10 year highs... How was I supposed to know that Google would miss on Revs, out of all the companies how could Google miss? Momma, Mirosoft missed too and missed badly, it is hard to believe but it has happened... even the company I invested your money in lost money Etrade profit fell by 78%!!! I am SCARED, I am really scared. My President said he was going to get a gun bill passed and it fell. Momma some person tried to send a dangerous letter to our President. There was an act of terron in Boston and in Texas there was a horrible explosion that killed at least 4 people and injured over 200. All this stuff happened this week and we have no answers on any of it. Dad you told me once it is not the swift nor the strong that wins the race but the one who endures. I am enduring now father, this market is sinking, there is so much spin on holding these stocks or even buying more of them. I see the same people on CNBC everyday telling me what to do... but they are the ones who got me into this mess. Jim Cramer talks everyday and he seems to be more wrong than right. I have lost everything my only hope is the spin from our government and CNBC can trick people into buying back into these stocks. I sure hope so... I am so sorry... I love you both. I need to ask one more favor...May I come home for a few days just to get some dry clothes because I am all wet.

I am enduring now father, this market is sinking, there is so much spin on holding these stocks or even buying more of them. I see the same people on CNBC everyday telling me what to do... but they are the ones who got me into this mess. Jim Cramer talks everyday and he seems to be more wrong than right. I have lost everything my only hope is the spin from our government and CNBC can trick people into buying back into these stocks. I sure hope so... I am so sorry... I love you both. I need to ask one more favor...May I come home for a few days just to get some dry clothes because I am all wet.
